backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing user subscription management, content generation, Stripe checkout integration, and access control with tier-based feature sets (free/pro/elite) using HTTP outcalls to Stripe's API.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two deployment-related features (canister ID in meta tag and dfx.json audit) to their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase.
frontend/docs/STRIPE_SETUP.md: Step-by-step guide for creating Pro and Elite Stripe subscription products, configuring webhooks, updating backend price IDs, and testing the checkout flow.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with basic meta tags, a root div, and a module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider, and renders the Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/ContentOutput.ts: Displays generated content (hooks, scripts, captions) in cards with copy-to-clipboard buttons and upgrade prompts for tier-locked features like scripts and captions.
frontend/src/components/ContentScoreCard: Displays a card showing hook strength, retention potential, and monetization potential scores as progress bars, along with an average score and optional virality explanation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with a sticky header, responsive navigation links (including admin-only Stripe Setup), and login/logout functionality via Internet Identity.
Renders a small amber-styled alert reminding users they are responsible for their content's compliance with laws and platform terms.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and optional email, then saves the profile via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation on first login.
frontend/src/components/UpgradePrompt.ts: Displays a locked-feature placeholder with the required subscription tier and a button linking to the pricing page for upgrading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: A React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor, accounting for actor loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks and mutations for backend interactions including user profile, subscription, admin checks, Stripe configuration, and content generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (colors, radius, chart, sidebar) using oklch color space, plus a fade-in animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ContentGenerator.tsx: Page component that lets authenticated users fill out a content generation form (niche, platform, tone, audience, goal) and calls backend mutation hooks to generate hooks, scripts, and captions, displaying results or upgrade prompts.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing the authenticated user's subscription tier, enabled feature set, and content request history, with a profile setup modal triggered for new users.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing product features, a step-by-step how-it-works section, and CTAs directing users to sign up or view pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Static page displayed after a cancelled or failed Stripe payment, offering buttons to retry checkout or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Page shown after a successful Stripe payment that invalidates subscription/featureSet queries and provides navigation links to the dashboard or content generator.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page that renders Free, Pro, and Elite plan cards with feature lists and handles plan selection by triggering Internet Identity login and creating a Stripe checkout session for paid tiers.
frontend/src/pages/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only page for configuring Stripe integration, allowing entry and saving of a Stripe secret key and allowed countries, with visibility toggle and edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionManagemen: Page for authenticated users to view their current subscription tier, associated features, and navigate to upgrade options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (using CSS variables), fonts, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and enabling the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features, a pending fix request to correct backend canister ID bindings in the frontend, and a known 404 canister-not-found production error.
